Container.Name: Astromich-DB
Container.Changes: ### PostgreSQL 15 Alpine - Optimized for AstroRep application - Automatic health checks - UTF-8 encoding with C collation
Container.Description:
PostgreSQL database container specifically configured for Astromich. This container provides persistent data storage for your astrophotography image metadata, equipment information, and plate solving results.
Features: - PostgreSQL 15 with Alpine Linux (lightweight) - Optimized configuration for Astromich - Health checks for reliability - UTF-8 encoding with C collation - Persistent data storage
IMPORTANT: Install this container BEFORE installing Astromich. Make sure to set a strong password and remember it for the Astromich configuration.
